name: TQN
body:
### Welcome to TQN
This is repository to capture some thoughts, quotes and notes from books I read. It's not meant to be a book review or summary just loose threads of ideas from each book. Depending on the material I might also note one thing I might now do differently based on what I have read. Welcome on this journey of life learning.

2016 Reading List

* The Art of Action by Stephen Bungay
* Becoming a Technical Leader by Geral Weinberg 
* Jack Welch and the GE Way by Robert Slater
* [The Riddle] (http://shoreason.github.io/2016/04/09/tqn-on-the-riddle.html)
* The Launch Pad by Randall Stross
* The Drucker lectures
* The SW airlines way by Jody Hoffer Gittell
* The Brain Advantage
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
